actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a National Nuclear Museum.

summary.text: Directs the Atomic Energy Commission to establish and maintain, in the State of New Mexico, a National Nuclear Museum for the advancement of public knowledge with respect to the uses and development of nuclear energy. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a National Nuclear Museum.
